metadata.title: CVE-2017-9474 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: In ytnef 1.9.2, the DecompressRTF function in lib/ytnef.c allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read and application crash) via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: libytnef package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9.3-1').
